newsitem.title: USA: E.W. Scripps April revs increase 11.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: E.W. Scripps April revs increase 11.6 pct.

text.p: The E.W. Scripps Co said on Thursday its consolidated revenues rose 11.6 percent in April to $100 million, compared with $89.6 million in April 1996.
Newspaper advertising revenues for the month were $43.2 million, up 16.2 percent and total newspaper revenues moved up 13.1 percent to $60.2 million, the company said.
Television station revenues increased 3.9 percent to $29 million, Scripps said.
Scripps said that its total year-to-date revenues incresed 13.6 percent to $390.8 million from $343.9 million.
